definition: exercising or taking care great enough to bring assurance
details:
adjective
- exercising or taking care great enough to bring assurance
= example: exercising or taking care great enough to bring assurance
= synonyms: sure
- certain to occur
= synonyms: sure
- reliable in operation or effect
= example: reliable in operation or effect
= synonyms: sure
- established irrevocably
= synonyms: sealed
- established beyond doubt or question
- having or feeling no doubt or uncertainty
= synonyms: sure
- definite but not specified or identified
